summary: This My First CBBE Mod Conversion
descriptionHtml:
My First CBBE Bodyslide Conversion From [url=https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/2405-necromantrix-armor-for-unp-jiggle/]Necromantrix Armor for UNP Jiggle 1.0[/url] By [url=https://www.loverslab.com/profile/62694-asenasen/]asenasen
[/url]

[b]Requirement(s) [/b]:
XMPSE2 Skeleton
 
[b]Installation [/b]:
Just use any mod manager to install the armor.
Or manually, you can just drop everything into [skyrim Directory]\Data

[b]Obtaining Methods [/b]:
Option 1: Use this wonderful mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]AddItemMenu[/url]
Option 2: Press “~” ingame to bring up console, type “help Necromantrix", and add the item into your game.
Option 3: TesVedit, CreationKit, etc (not recommended)

[b]Credits [/b]:
Necroscope for HGEC BBB Lady Death Variants
Hwibalyu aka hh2 for blacklotus and skorpio
GSBmodders for BBB DMRA Lady Death conversion
Exnem and RAIAR and many others for the body mods
Bethesda Softworks
BaronB (aka BayouBilly) for Miqo'te Undergarment Addon
Cenobite for the base meshes and textures.
Kendo2 for the wristlet and body meshes.
xXDeliteXx for the sandals meshes
author: Estjava

files.name: Necromantrix CBBE HDT Bodyslide v1.0 Fix
files.fileName: Necromantrix CBBE HDT Bodyslide v1.0 Fix-93283-1-0.rar
files.changelogHtml:
About the mod:
This is a conversion for the Oblivion armor mod - Necromantrix by Cenobite
(http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/42856/?) to the UNP Jiggle body
for Skyrim.
I only converted the body armor. Because the gloves and shoes are too low
poly and wouldn't look good in Skyrim, I use Kendo2's Sexy
Necromancer Wristlet (http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/1650-unp-jiggle-by-kendo-2/)
, and xXDeliteXx's Gladiator Sandals (http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/1745-gladiator-sandals/)
as their substitutions.
Note that the collar chain will clip with certain poses. I also made it a separate item to compensate
this. The armor has full weight slider support, and comes in three pieces: armor, sandals, and gloves
(I will probably fix this name if there are too many complaints)

Requirement(s):
-XMPSE2 Skeleton
